name: ToyHou.se Black Navigation and Footer
description: Changes ToyHouse's navigation bar and footer background to black. Works on all TH themes. Navigation link colours are changed to off-white and grey on hover. Footer link colours are unchanged and match your current TH theme. Premium is not required! Questions? Issues with the style? Send me a message at 'NoxAmira' on TH. https://toyhou.se/NoxAmira Feel free to edit and distribute your own version.
